content: POST request body successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that the request body has been successfully copied to the clipboard. It appears as a label on a button in the UI, informing users of the outcome of an action. Translators should focus on conveying a sense of confirmation and success.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تم نسخ نص طلب POST بنجاح إلى الحافظة' is a literal translation and can be improved for naturalness in Arabic. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: نسخ نص طلب POST بنجاح إلى الحافظة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "POST sorğusunun əsas hissəsi mübadilə buferinə uğurla nüsxələndi" is not a perfect translation of 'POST request body successfully copied to clipboard'. 'Əsas hissəsi' (main part) doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'body'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: POST sorğusunun bədəni uğurla mübadilə buferinə nüsxələndi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'mübadilə buferinə' could be simplified and sound more natural. 'Bufer' is a direct transliteration of 'buffer'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: keçid yaddaşina

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Текстът' (The text) is a bit verbose. While technically correct, 'Заявката' (The request) alone is more concise and natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Заявката е успешно копирана в клипборда

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'portapapele' is not standard Spanish. It's a combination of 'portapapeles' (clipboard) and the suffix '-e'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: El cuerpo de la solicitud POST se ha copiado correctamente en el portapapeles

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄລິບບອດ' is likely a misspelling of 'ຄລິບອດ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄລິບອດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "POST-aanvraagtekst" is overly literal and not idiomatic Dutch. 'POST-aanvraag' is understandable but sounds technical. A more natural phrasing would be 'POST-verzoek' or 'Inkomende POST-verzoek'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Inkomende POST-verzoek succesvol gekopieerd naar klembord

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Hyphenation in 'POST-aanvraagtekst' looks awkward. Dutch typically avoids such long hyphenated words.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: POST aanvraagtekst

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the term 'área de transferência'. While technically correct, 'clipboard' is often used and might be more easily understood by users in a technical context. Consistency with other UI elements would also be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more direct translation of 'clipboard' if consistent with other UI elements, or re-evaluate the need for 'área de transferência'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Corpo da solicitação POST copiado com sucesso para a área de transferência' is a literal translation and slightly awkward in natural Brazilian Portuguese. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow and readability. 'Área de transferência' is a more formal term; 'clipboad' or 'pressa de transferência' would be more commonly used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Corpo da requisição POST copiado com sucesso para a área de transferência, clipboad ou para a pressa de transferência.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the English word 'clipboard'. While understandable, using a more natural Romanian equivalent would improve the flow and feel more localized. While 'clipboard' is borrowed into Romanian, a native alternative is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Corpul solicitării POST a fost copiat cu succes în zona de lipire

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'POST ඉල්ලීමේ අන්තර්ගතය පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් විය' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express this in Sinhala.  'ඉල්ලීම' is accurate for 'request', 'අන්තර්ගතය' for 'body', and 'පසුරු පුවරුවට' for 'clipboard', but the phrasing is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'POST ඉල්ලීමෙහි ඇති දත්ත පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් විය' or 'POST ඉල්ලීමෙහි ඇති දේ පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් විය'. Both translate to 'POST request body copied to clipboard', but with better flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "odložišče" typically refers to a storage location (like a trash bin or a repository) rather than a clipboard. A more accurate translation for 'clipboard' would be 'spričevalnico'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Telo zahteve POST je bilo uspešno kopirano v spričevalnico

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Тело POST захтева успешно копирано у привремену меморију' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. 'Привремену меморију' translates to 'temporary memory', which is not the common understanding of a clipboard in Serbian. It's more accurately described as 'клипборд' or a similar phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тело POST захтева успешно копирано у клипборд.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'захтева' should be 'захтева'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тело POST захтева успешно копирано у клипборд.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Telo POST zahteva uspešno kopirano u privremenu memoriju' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'POST request body successfully copied to clipboard'.  'Privremena memorija' translates to 'temporary memory' and 'clipboard' has a more specific meaning. A better translation would imply copying to the clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Telo POST zahteva uspešno kopirano u isečanje.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'isečanje' is technically correct but a more common synonym for 'clipboard' might be better. Consider using a term more widely understood by users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Telo POST zahteva uspešno kopirano na isečak.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct, but lacks natural flow and idiomatic expression in Ukrainian. 'Тіло запиту POST успішно скопійовано до буфера обміну' is a literal translation and sounds somewhat awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Успішно скопійовано тіло POST-запиту в буфер обміну

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'POST' should be consistently formatted (e.g., all caps or all lowercase) for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use either all caps (POST) or lowercase (post) consistently.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã sao chép thành công POST request body vào bộ nhớ tạm' is not a completely accurate translation of 'POST request body successfully copied to clipboard'. While it conveys the general meaning, it could be improved for clarity and flow in Vietnamese. 'Bộ nhớ tạm' translates to 'temporary memory' or 'temporary storage', while 'clipboard' has a more specific meaning in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép thành công nội dung POST request vào clipboard

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, including the English term 'POST request' directly in the Vietnamese translation is not ideal. It's better to use a more descriptive term if possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more descriptive term for 'POST request' if the target audience understands it. If not, explain the type of request (e.g., 'yêu cầu POST').
